nodes.text: Mustafarian Lava Rolls, also known as Mustafarian Cinnamon Rolls, were sweet baked goods served for breakfast in Black Spire Outpost on the Outer Rim planet Batuu. Oga's Cantina and Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo both sold them as a food item, while the latter also included a Mini Mustafarian Lava Roll with the Bright Suns Morning breakfast entrée. The rolls were suitable for consumption by humans.

Mustafarian Lava Roll are found in the real world in Oga's Cantina and in Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The menu's description reads, "Sweet galactic delight," and some prior menu versions included, "Cinnamon roll with chocolate cookie crumble and lava sauce." A post on the official Disney Parks Blog described it further as "topped with raspberry fondant, lemon, and cookies and cream cookie crumbles." The item was renamed to Mustarian Cinnamon Roll following its introduction.
